item.description:
Some more detail about this event may help people so here goes:

ALL shows are 21 and over - ID is a Must to get in!

Thursday night the show starts at 7:30 sharp. We will meet inside the mall, outside the entrance where you buy your tee shirt/ticket at 7:15pm.

Each Thursday is a different comedian. These are start-up comedians from hartford, these are guys and gals you've seen on tv and comedy central! Your entertainment for the evening is Loni Love ﻿﻿. You may have seen her on Television many times!

Costs/Payments: Your payment options are to buy a ticket for $17. Or buy a tee shirt ($15) which you can use that night and almost any other thursday to get in for no additional cost!! - Great Deal!! So why not!?

The inside set up are tables for 4 forming a  half circle around the stage.

 

See You There!

Christian ﻿﻿(860) 357-7264

Brett  (203) 651-9166
item.how_to_find_us: You can call me (Chris) at 860-357-7264, I'll talk to Brett about setting up a specific way to gather everybody up.
item.name: T-Shirt Night at Funny Bone Comedy Night pt. II
